name: Chinese Chess XiangQi Formula
description:
This is an interactive XiangQi tutorial book for Non-Asian people or anyone who can read English.

* Tons of annotated games with step-by-step Analysis. , the best way to learn XiangQi.
* Select variations during browsing games, you could go through all branches.
* Learn all kinds of strategy patterns in Openinggame/Midgame/Endgame.
* Play offline chess with 5 difficulty levels of AI
* Lots of chess Puzzles for you.
* Completely Ad-free.
* Either Chinese or Western Chess Symbols.
* Showing possible moves, ability to unlimitedly Unmove.
* Best way to learn Chinese Chess with the Hint feature.
